name: Dream Chaser (itch) (mustiian, ElenaVoznaya, Nebushka)
description:
What happens when the average guy doesn't follow the choices of others?

The game developed in 48 hours for the game jam GAMEHIGHED Jam 2021

How to play:
- Space button to switch between dialogues 
- Mouse left click to interact with buttons

Developers:
Vozna Olena - Art 
Nebohatkina Oksana - Art & Story
Zeiderman - Music
Ian Mustiats - Code
